Title: Protects persons receiving care, employed, or otherwise present at a hospital from immigration arrests; prohibits federal immigration officers acting within the scope of their employment from entering hospitals
Summary: Protects persons receiving care, employed, or otherwise present at a hospital from immigration arrests; prohibits federal immigration officers acting within the scope of their employment from entering hospitals unless supported by a judicial warrant or order; defines judicial warrant or order.
LawCode: Add ยง29, Civ Rts L; add ยง2832, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law and the public health law, in relation to prohibiting federal immigration officers acting within the scope of their employment from entering hospitals
